title: Bots, bots and more bots and AFK players
body:
Can Riot not tell the difference between players and bots or are they that under staffed they just don't give a shit about banning them.

Every single game half the dam team are bots or AFK players, seriously, if you need to take a shit, feed you're kids, do homework, go to school/work DON'T queue up for a game.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Vi Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aaWaT5E6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-23T02:34:14.661+0000)
>
> Sorry :( ill just uninstall now.

Thank you, appreciated. ;)
